participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Determined and adventurous, I thrive on challenges both on and off the court.
participant_1.background: i'm a professional tennis player. i enjoy long walks with my dog. i live in a three storey house. my family is continuously growing.

participant_2.name: Mike
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and supportive, I love sharing my passion for sports with kids.
participant_2.background: coffee is my preferred beverage. i coach little league baseball. i have five sons. i drive a mini van. i also like a glass of wine in the evenings.
